title.rendered: Nicole Benisti Collaborates With Nicola Peltz Beckham as Brand Ambassador for Fall/Winter 22

content.rendered:
Nicole Benisti, the Montreal based luxury outerwear designer, unveils her Fall/Winter 2022 campaign starring Nicola Peltz Beckham.



MONTREAL - November 3, 2022 - (Newswire.com)

Nicole Benisti, the Montreal based luxury outerwear designer, unveils her Fall/Winter 2022 campaign starring Nicola Peltz Beckham. Shot by world-renowned fashion photography duo Luigi & Iango in signature black and white and sombered colored captures, the first looks to be released from the campaign feature Nicola Peltz Beckham in a shimmering black tweed down jacket, billowing kimono puffer and a quintessential Nicole Benisti mixed-media shearling coat.

Nicole Benisti's Fall/Winter 22 campaign exclusively exhibits studio portraits as an homage to the importance of still photography in fashion. Nicole Benisti enlisted Vogue stylist Michael Philouze to create a rock and roll aesthetic influenced by Nicola Peltz Beckham's unique sartorial perspective. Makeup artist Kate Lee accentuated the actress' striking features with a dramatic liner while Evanie Frausto on hair opted for a tousled bedhead mane.

Nicole Benisti on her first collaboration with Nicola Peltz Beckham says "incredibly elegant and genuine, she is an emblem of modern beauty seamlessly bridging luxury and fashion in today's social era."

Nicole Benisti's Fall/Winter 22 collection launches internationally this month. The collection comprises signature mixed-media puffers in voluminous silhouettes made from soft shearlings, luxurious tweeds and rich cashmere. 

###

ABOUT NICOLE BENISTI

Designed in Montreal, Canada, Nicole Benisti is for the modern-day woman, exuding effortless elegance, sophistication and glamor. Fusing style and functionality, Nicole Benisti offers interchangeable designs that capture the essence of contemporary fashion. Exhibiting unique originality that combines luxury and streetwear, each design offers a fashion-forward versatility, stylish and sleek pieces perfect for transitioning from day to night and week to weekend. To stay connected with the brand on instagram: 

@NicoleBenisti or visit NicoleBenisti.com


Contact Information:
Lauren Pugh
Global Brand Director
lauren@nicolebenisti.com
514.250.6414


Press Release Service by Newswire.com

Original Source: Nicole Benisti Collaborates With Nicola Peltz Beckham as Brand Ambassador for Fall/Winter 22
